title: Fact: Batman would own Goku
body:
How did I come to this conclusion? Well that is simple.

First: Superman > Goku. Here is the proof:
http://static7.comicvine.com/uploads/scale_super/12/123441/2925503-break_down.png

Second: Batman > Superman. Anyone who has seen The Dark Knight Returns or Batman v Superman would know that.
http://66.media.tumblr.com/eb1a90cee2d1e8fed41af68d31f10c66/tumblr_mgjwhd9got1qa69wso7_400.gif

So therefore Batman > Superman > Goku.
http://images-cdn.9gag.com/photo/am9dWgV_700b.jpg


And that isn't even taking into account one *very* important factor: 
#**HE IS THE GODDAMN BATMAN**!
https://66.media.tumblr.com/2e1db2a0c1e0682ffc741dbb8b3743bc/tumblr_nyhsrqT4U91tslewgo1_500.gif 


As long as Goku doesn't say Martha, Batman can't lose.
http://media.fyre.co/5X9mksdcSHCFAD7Vretr_60c108c2735d549e50fd8c7e2c6927da3de95b46220fac64932f9d26aa2d08ae_1.gif

Now, I know all you Goku fanboys will some how find a way to take offense at basic logic. You know where to find me.
http://i.gifntext.com/49911-well-here-i-am.gif

replies.body:
I found a comparison to this post:

* Paper beats Rock
* Rock beats Scissors
* Therefore Paper beats Scissors

I think Laughing Fish might have a *bit* more proof to do before he can claim this one...
Fact: Paper cannot beat rock. Even if the paper completely covers and immobilize the rock, the paper will decompose *long* before the rock does. So yes, Rock > Scissors > Paper.
http://futurefirstlady.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/thats-not-how-it-works.gif?noredirect
http://i.imgur.com/4nsBBpq.jpg

notice how batman needs prep time. goku would never make his enemy wait like that.

batman is a confirmed coward.
To be fair, Goku has been known to give enemies prep time whenever they want to power up.
Where dafuq is the SAITAMA option?
hes a joke...
I included all of the realistic options. There were other possibilities, but they were so unlikely they were practically impossible, and I could only include the top 10.
Goku would win. Then he would say GG EZ.

Goku win? You make me laugh.
https://33.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m6k23hkB2F1qjkugeo1_500.gif

This would be batman.

http://www.mrdiggles.com/img/batman-is-dead.jpg

I already proved why Batman would win

https://33.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m6k23hkB2F1qjkugeo1_500.gif

"Here's the proof"
Throws out numbers with no evidence or explanation. 

Here's a counter argument 

https://goo.gl/images/Unprkq

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oyl97TG8jbA

here is my counter argument

DDDEEEAAATTTHHHHBBBAATTTTLLLLLEEEE
EARNED MY UPVOTE.

Superman isn't that fast, he's barely faster than the speed of light. 
Raditz was faster than the speed of light. 
And anyone who's watched the show would know, Goku did become faster than raditz. By a lot.

> [{quoted}](name=yerteenagedream,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=gMRctrt7,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-08-02T20:57:17.793+0000)
>
> Superman isn't that fast, he's barely faster than the speed of light. 
> Raditz was faster than the speed of light. 
> And anyone who's watched the show would know, Goku did become faster than raditz. By a lot.

I swear does anyone ever do research on these things?

-Goku is literally the trope of a MC who can constantly break limits get stronger via the magic of some McGuffin that gets popped outta nowhere, or just plain grants him an advantage.

*Defeated Vegeta with Kaioken, Spirit Bomb and friends and his son's help.

*Curb stomps the Ginyu force members even though some had used 'dirty tricks' and even Vegeta got devastated by some of them too.

*Defeats Frieza via going Super Saiyan.

*Cell Defeated since he pretty much passed the Mcguffin to Gohan(Super Saiyan 2).

*Decimates a number of movie villians with Spirit bomb, powered up Kamehameha, etc. and a good one being the Super android 13 one, 'Absorbing a Spirit bomb to basically pull off a Spirit Super Saiyan shockwave move.'

Doesnt even stop there with Super Saiyan 3, Fusion Dance with Vegeta, Fusion Earrings with Vegeta, going Super Saiyan 4 in GT, going 'Saiyan God mode' against Beerus and then suddenly becoming a god tier and then doing it again with 'Super Saiyan God' in the Freiza rematch.

While Superman is the trope of a Character being omnipotent but actually doesn't use every bit of his own power he has whether he hasn't hit the potential level yet or he's mentally blocking the limits to not do what Goku might as well do on a daily basis, namely unleash massive overkill attacks to decimate his foes.

Plus you have the typical trope of if both of them were put under the same proper conditions that aren't either 'back ground characters are braindead or insignificant in any way what so ever or less its important to a plot, they either have the love or hate without reason for a hero character.' Then plenty of shit might ensue like how many charges, fines and what not could be put into place for causing damages, disasters or similar things for recklessness, destruction and so on caused even when they 'aren't' in the middle of fighting some 'trope villain that either wants to take over the world or destroy it."


As for the Argument that Batman beats Goku because Batman beats Superman and Superman beats Goku. It can only work since the following things would have to occur.

-Batman would use ingenuity instead of just having a fist fight with Goku without using any kind of special devices, items or any means he normally employs against all his 'powerful and dangerous foes he goes against.

-Goku follows the trope of being a powerful 'fighter', but is quite the silly battle maniac idiot. Take away Goku's Saiyan powers and all the ki blasts, flying and all the other gags which a standard manga or anime tends to bring into the pace usually to cover up a character itself. Goku would be the equivalency to a simple fight loving person who pretty much would have to do manual labor to earn a living. That pretty much would make it relatively easy for Batman to take advantage of his 'simple nature' to over'come the power gap which is normally does via tactical abilities.

-Unless Goku magically became immune to all viruses and sicknesses after nearly being killed by Dr. Gero using a heart disease virus (which in the Future trunks timeline, he actually dies to it and its only due to Future Trunks providing medicine by going into the past to save him that happens), especially after becoming a God tier being. Then Goku should technically still still be weak to biological attacks, which Batman is not the type to shy away from using items like Scarecrow's Fear gas if it becomes necessary or similar measures.

-Lets not even forget that Bruce Wayne is a extremely influential person with his WayneTec company and as Batman, would be quite good at researching his 'foes' and can even go as far to look into possible weaknesses or elements of them he could exploit to 'level the playing field'. Since the DC universe is not exactly a stranger to dealing with magic, otherworldly things and other kinds of energy and technology, it wouldn't be that hard for Batman to pull a McGuffin such as a possible weakness/problems that Saiyan biology could have naturally.

So in the end: Goku could easily destroy Batman in a unprepared fight, but he's the kind to prefer to hold back for a challenge of a fight and could easily have his own leg shoved down his throat by letting 'Batman get some time to prepare(technically that was pulled when Goku could of taken down Cell easily but just like Vegeta letting Cell get to his Perfect Form, Goku rather op for his opponent to get a proper fight then ending a monstrosity early on.
                          So likely Goku would get a dose of a powerful virus before or 'when' the fight starts, leaving him in a impaired state, letting Batman able to take him down, just like how Batman takes down Superman via the use of Kryptonite to either win the match or weaken Superman enough to where Batman has a chance in a powered Mech suit or similar equipment to let him hit hard enough against a weakened, but still powerful Superman.
I feel like saying NERD!!!, and walking away but i actually understand this...

They explained in the show that when a saiyan takes damage, their body evolves and recovers stronger. Dying explains why he did this exponentially. Not to mention he trains all the time. 
Whereas superman just pulls any power he needs out of nowhere and just gets to be as strong as he wants with no plot explaining why other than he's an alien.

...  super man traveled from earth to the sun and back while fighting some one in 2 mins.... now imagine him actually trying.... btw to get to and back from the sun in 2 min you would have to go like speed of light x60
Superman's speed is capped on Earth as his full speed would kill everything around him. His theoretical speed is overwhelmingly faster.

I might just be salty but...
